content: make 2 hook j10 yarn lion brand jiffy gauge 4 stitches and 2 row per 1 inch for half_double_crochet stitches chain 23 r1 skip first chain single_crochet in next chain single_crochet to end chain 4 turn counts as first double_crochet r2 double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook ch1 10 times chain 1 double_crochet in last stitch chain 1 turn 12 double_crochet r3 single_crochet in 1st double_crochet single_crochet in chain 1 space single_crochet in double_crochet to end chain 2 turn 22 single_crochet ending wth single_crochet in last double_crochet r4 half_double_crochet in each single_crochet to end 22 half_double_crochet chain 4 turn r5 double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 10 times chain 1 double_crochet in last chain ch1 turn r6 single_crochet in 1st double_crochet single_crochet in ch1 space single_crochet in double_crochet to end 22 single_crochet chain 2 turn ending with single_crochet in last double_crochet r7-8 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in each single_crochet to end 22 half_double_crochet chain 2 turn r9 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next 3 chain chain 4 half_double_crochet in 5th chain from hook half_double_crochet in each chain to end chain 2 turn 19 half_double_crochet r10 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain half_double_crochet 11 times half_double_crochet in chain 4 space 4 times half_double_crochet to end chain 2 turn r11-16 half_double_crochet in each chain to end chain 2 turn leave 10 tail to sew sides together place wristlets in front of you be sure to position thumb holes correctly before seaming together essentially you will flip one of the wristlets this is an important step i had to redo one of each my daughters due to watching tv at the same time haha next use ribbons or chain a length of contrasting jiffy yarn as seen in pic i used a 21 length of chain for the lacing to finish off single_crochet in contrasting color evenly spaced around the top of the wristlet for bottom do the same or as i did evenly spaced around the bottom do this pattern single_crochet picot single_crochet picot viola please do not sell these use this pattern to give away as gifts and if you show them please place a link to the pattern on my blog thank you carey 2008
